headline: Specific examples of projects you work full-time for?
description:
I see quite a lot of complaints that there is not much interesting jobs left for programmers these days except starting your own thing.

Just boring plumbing of big and often over engineered boring products or learning yet another complicated framework just to raise some profits to another 2%

If you’re really excited about your full time job as a software engineer — please share as much details as you can (name, industry, url, target audience, what’s in it that excites you).
